text: qlwbhm ghaflt ean alquran alkrym, mshghwlt babatyl aldunya wshhwatha, la yaeqilun ma fyh. bal 'iina alzaalimin min quraysh aijtamaeuu ealaa 'amr khafiin: wahu 'iishaeat ma ysddun bih alnaas ean al'iiman bmhmd salaa allah ealayh wasalam min 'anah bashar mthlhm, la yakhtalif eanhum fi shy', wa'ana ma ja' bih min alquran shr, fkyf tjyywn 'iilayh wttbewnh, wa'antum tubsirun 'anah bashar mthlkm?
